original: Larsson, Nils Sigfrid, komminister, Hultsfred, f. 12/2/95 i Kviinge, Kris^t. 1., av Sven L. o. Nilla Larsson. G. 24 m. Svea Jönsson. Barn: Ulla-Stina f. 26. — Efter stud. v. Kristianstads h. a. 1. samt Upps. univ. prästv. f. Linköp. stift 20. V. pastor i Vireda o. Hauri-da 20’-22, tf. kyrkoh. i Gladhammar o. Västrum 24-27, v. pastor i Vena 29-30, brukspred, i Överum 27-29, v. pastor i V. Ed 28, Dalhem 29, kommin. i Hultsfred sed. 29, pred. v. Hultsfreds sjukhem sed. 30. Ordf. i Vireda o. Haurida kyrko- o. skolråd samt kyrkostämma 20’-22, Västrums dito 22-27 samt Vena o. Hultsfreds 29-30, över-förmynd. i Västrum 25-27, insp. f. Västrums föreläsn :fören. 24-27, Över-ums dito 27-29, Hultsfreds dito sed. 45, led. av kyrkoråd, barnav:ndn sed. 29, ordf. 29-37, skolkassör i Hultsfred 32-33, v. ordf. i kyrkofullm. sed. 30, ordf. i kyrkogårdsnd, i styr. f. h. folk-sk. 37-39, insp. f. densamma 40-46, insp. f. Hultsfreds komm. mellansk. sed. 47, v. ordf. i köpingsfullm. 30-42, ordf. i beredn :utsk. 30-37. Skr.: Hultsfreds kyrka.
translated: Larsson, Nils Sigfrid, vicar, Hultsfred, b. 12/2/95 in Kviinge, Kristianstad län, son of Sven L. and Nilla Larsson. Married on 24 with Svea Jönsson. Children: Ulla-Stina b. 26. — After studies at Kristianstads högre allmänna läroverk and Uppsala University, ordained as a priest in the Linköping Diocese in 1920. Vice pastor in Vireda and Hauri-da from 1920-1922, temporary vicar in Gladhammar and Västrum from 1924-1927, vice pastor in Vena from 1929-1930, industrial preacher in Överum from 1927-1929, vice pastor in V. Ed in 1928, Dalhem in 1929, vicar in Hultsfred since 1929, preacher at Hultsfreds sjukhem since 1930. Chairman of the church and school council, as well as the church meeting, in Vireda and Haurida from 1920-1922, Västrum from 1922-1927, and Vena and Hultsfred from 1929-1930. Guardian in Västrum from 1925-1927, inspector for Västrums föreläsningsförening from 1924-1927, Overum from 1927-1929, Hultsfred since 1945, member of the church council and child welfare committee since 1929, chairman from 1929-1937, school treasurer in Hultsfred from 1932-1933, vice chairman of the church council since 1930, chairman of the cemetery committee and the board for h. folk-sk. from 1937-1939, inspector for the same from 1940-1946, inspector for Hultsfreds kommunala mellanskolan since 1947, vice chairman of the köpingsfullmäktige from 1930-1942, chairman of the preparatory committee from 1930-1937. Writings: Hultsfreds kyrka.
